name: Divine Go-D/D/D Zero King Zero G.O.D. Reiji
text:
Cannot be destroyed by battle, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card. When this card declares an attack while your opponent's LP are 4000 or less: You can make this card gain ATK equal to your opponent's LP until the end of this turn. You can Tribute 1 other monster; apply 1 of these effects until the end of this turn.
? This card can attack directly.
? Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in their Spell & Trap Zones.
? Your opponent cannot activate card effects from their hand or GY.
pendulum_text: The first time you would take effect damage each turn, you do not. Each turn, 1 Level 5 or higher "D/D" monster you Normal Summon can be Summoned without Tributing. You can only use each Pendulum Effect of "Divine Go-D/D/D Zero King Zero G.O.D. Reiji" once per turn.
